unnormalised: Bore bhau, chala poisa-taka, Bharoti pod'dotin uloum-ia! Khas korun, banking ani rokdiche vevhara voilean choloum-ia, punn eka nattke-vattkan. Ami tem khorem dovortat, bhangarache arthik ut'tor-provachon nhoi, fakat zoxe ami uloitat ani amche poisa sangata vevhar kortat. Mhunn tumchi chai ghevn, bosun ravat, ani ami survat kortat!
normalised: Barabor mhunnge, chol'lya poisa vishayan uloya, Bharoti pod'dotin! Visheshh korun, banking ani rokkh mell-gevichea jivat divo maruya, punn eka gungant. Ami tem khorem thevtat, koslich shringarik vittiya ut'taraulli nhoi, fakt ji pod'dotin ami khorench ut'tor dita ani amchea poisa sangata mellghevo koruncho. Techakhatir tumchi chai dhora, bes tumche suater bosa, ani chol'lya ami shuru koruya!

unnormalised: Poilem vostu poilem, bori purani rokdichi vyohar. Te dis ugddaita jithe soglle ₹500 hem ani ₹2000 tem aslem? Zalea punn UPI he disan lokpriy zata, koxi tumka rokdiche sangata deal korchea vinnem netaruch zatam, khas korun te lhan kirana dukana nirmann korcheak vo thollache bhaji valak. Mol bhaun-karnem ek rashtriy khell asa, ani mojeacher bhavo dovrat, tum Google Pay sangat mol bhaun-karunk zaina! Hanvem ekdam ₹100 badlek fokot ₹80 khatir ambe ek kilo gheunk sodhlo fokot dhaktto panch-hazar rupyanche note ujel dakhou. Sambhavnanchi sakti, moje ixtt!
normalised: Poile poilem, bori zuni rokkh mell-gevi. Tem dis ugddasa jevhna sogllem panch so rupiya aslem ani don hazar tem? Jodi UPI he disan ani cholta, kedna tumi khoreponn khor kasht mell-gevi chodd korunk podta, khaskarun te lhan kirana dukani vo tem sthanik sabzi valak. Bhashenkarponn ajun ek raxttrik khel asa, ani mhaka visvas dovra, tumhi Google Pay sangata bhashenkarponn korunk shakonam! Ek pavti mhaka ek kilo ambe rupiya assi melo rupiya ekso bharti rupiya ekso rupiya, fakt ek murgull'li pach shukro rupiya not fassonk zata. Preranni Shakti, mhoje ixttanno!

unnormalised: Atam, banking vixim. Xamach korun, konnaka bankan vochunk ruchta? Lamb pori, forms... *shudders*. Punn tumka kedna vochunk zata. Eke naveen account ugddun? Tem Aadhaar card, PAN card, passport-size photo ani khub dhiraj. Ani tum minimum balance vixim survat korunk di-nakat! Tum bhagyavan asal, tumka ek bank mellonk xakta ji tumka ₹5000 tumche accountan dhoronk sangona. Dusrea ritin, te dukhdaink vije tumche jivnnatlean utratat, tum "RBI" utrat sadink zait torui.
normalised: Atam, banking visheant. Sat sangon, konak bankant vochonk ruchta? Lamb lina, form… shuddar. Punn kedna tumak vochonk zata. Ekk novem khate ughodunk? Tem Aadhaar card, P-A-N card, passport-size chitram, ani ek vhodd dhir. Ani mhaka tem unichh balansani shur korunkodinim. Zori tumak bhagyavan asa, tumka ek bank mellpak zata ji tumchi rupiya panch hazar tumche khatean dorunk sanginant sodankal. Natar te nirdharak vittiya kharch tumche sampada "R-B-I" sangonk shakonam tatun khatoli.

unnormalised: Bharoti Reserve Bank (RBI) vixim ulounk, tankam niyam sodankal bodol korun asat, kiteak? Eka disan te naveen ₹20 noti navinyan rupani sodun asa, dusrea disan te digital poisa vixim ulounk lagtat. Tem sambhallunk khub kathin! Ani tumka KYC (Know Your Customer) prakriya vixim ulounk di-nakat. Dorek panch vorsan, tumka bankak fattim vochunk zata adhik kagotpatran tum tumchich asal mhunn dokhovnk! Zoxe te sochta ami sogllim gupt ritin poisa ud'dhonn korcho yotn korun asa!
normalised: Reserve Bank of India (R-B-I) sangon, te sodankal niyoman badlunk zata, nhi? Ek dis te nave rupiya vis notanchi suvarnachitram ani suvarnachitrancho ubod vortat, dusrea dis te digital chalon visheant utor dita. Tem samballunk kasht zata! Ani mhaka sogllea K-Y-C (Know Your Customer) prakriyen shur korunkodinim. Dor varsa tumak bankak porot chalonk podta chodd kagada tumi ajun tumi asa mhunn prove korunk! Tanka dishta ki ami soglle gupt rupant poiso saf karunk prayatn kortat!

unnormalised: Magir ek sogllo ATM sthiti asa. Ek vadak ATM desachea bhagani sodun ek unicorn sodinche porim asa. Ani tumka eka sod mellta tor, tem poisa bhaire asa, screen tutto asa, vo konnita kaka 20 minutan thamblem asa koxe ₹200 bhair kaddunk sodta. Ani kaddnneche vel vicharunk visoronakat – sodrank ₹10,000 vo ₹20,000 dorekak vevharan. Tumka adhik koshi lagtat?!
normalised: Tanant A-T-M sthiti. Deshache kaim bhagant ek karya korunk A-T-M mell-lo ek younikorn shodpachem asa. Ani jevhna tumak antim rupan ek mellta, tea velar tem rokkh bharti asa, skin tuttla, vo kunhi kaka vis mintani rupiya don shukro kadunk prayatn karta. Ani rokkh kadneachem marya vikhar disonam – rupiya dha hazar vo rupiya vis hazar dor mell-gevichak. Zori tumka chodd goroz asa tor?!

unnormalised: Punn tum online bankingichea vishvache vicharunk visoronakat. NEFT vo RTGS vaprun poisa transfer korun? Khub sopik! Khas korun tumchi bhaji ₹2000 tem navin saree ji taka Diwali khatir zai te patounk podta tedna. Zalearun, net banking passowrds... eka uppercase aksharanchem, lowercase aksharanchem, ankachem, ani khas aksharanchem jumble jachi hanv sadarponen dorekak vellen visortam. Kismet, khoinchim tor bankan sadarponen vapronk sompe apps asat, punn tem servertlean bairan asat tedna tankam niras zache kshan asonk xaktat.
normalised: Punn tumhin on-line bankingache aushcharyani visrun nako. N-E-F-T vo R-T-G-S vaprun poiso pethounk? Atishay sope! Khaskarun tumka rupiya don hazar tumche bhinneak ti nave sadi jee ti Diwalik goroz asa tantrik. Jodi, net banking pasa word… eka vhodd aksharancho ghurmull, lhan aksharancho ghurmull, ankancho, ani visheshh charaktrancho jee mhaka satya rupant sodankal visrun zata. Sukhachi baat mhunnge chodd bankanche aushcharya dharak application asa, punn tenechya pachi vellam zalak zata jevhna server khali asta.

unnormalised: Ani xevttkek, tem dukhdaink vyavhar vije vixim ek utor. Khoinchim tor bankan tumka soglle khatir charge kortat – dusrea bankache ATM vaprun vo tumche balance online check korun! Tumka tumchem goddre noktran poisa bhortach poddchem asa. Khorench punn, somadhan vije sangata bankan vochchea badlek dukana voch vo boreak UPI vaprun tem dusrea chargeank "goodbye" sang!
normalised: Ani antim rupan, te nirdharak mell-gevi kharch visheant ek utor. Kaim bank tumchi dor vostuk paiso ghetat – dusrea bankachem A-T-M vaprunk vo tumche balans on-line tarkunk! Tem tumchem mattress poisen bharti dauk zata. Satheponn sangunk zata, bhartiche bankant duka dhukan kormit kormit paiso ghetat ani UPI mellyat ani tumchin tem dharak kharch visaroon jaat.

unnormalised: Mhunn tum tetha asa, Bharotant banking ani rokdiche vyavharan sodanchie chitravli. Tem ek nirvegh, kedna niras korpi, punn nimannek amchea sadachanche jivitan khub mukhy bhag asa. Atam, tum maf korat, hanv tem ₹500 note deposit korunk vochonk zai, hanv tem adhik chai khatir aapghatink korunchonk ailem-i adim!
normalised: Techakhatir tumchea sangata, Bharotachi banking ani rokkh mel-geviache jivat ek chitranj. Tem eka ajab, kedna kharabh zata, punn antim rupan amchea disache jivanacho ek khara bhag asa. Atam, tumhi mhaka maf kara, mhaka rupiya pach shukro ti noth ghetink podta mhunnche mhaka dusri chai ghetak podonk.
